channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: 3ABN Sabbath School Panel
channel.desc: The host teams up with a panel of religious scholars to conduct various discussions that provide an in-depth analysis on the Bible and the life of Jesus Christ.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Behold the Lamb Presents
channel.desc: What is needed to prepare for the kingdom of heaven; hosted by Chris Shelton with uplifting music.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Ultimate Prescription
channel.desc: Nick Evenson and Dr. James Marcum.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Abundant Living
channel.desc: Discover recipes to help strengthen the heart such as a colorful stir-fry over rice, flavorful garlicky green beans, and, finish with a thick strawberry/banana sorbet.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Imperative Life Lessons
channel.desc: God's giving is enough to supply all needs, even when He provides just enough for the day; an inspirational message about the loving Father.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: 3ABN Today Bible Q&A
channel.desc: Many claim that the Bible is unreliable because it was written and altered by man; this is a notion the devil would be delighted for everyone to accept.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: 3ABN Kids Camp Kitchen Fun
channel.desc: Creating healthy and delicious dishes in the kitchen with parents or friends is a great way to nourish the body, as well as the soul.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Tiny Tots Kitchen
channel.desc: Miss Cinda demonstrates how to make Sloppy Salamis with tiny tots Levi, Shiloh, Christiana and John Wesley.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Tiny Tots Worship
channel.desc: Host Cinda Sanner helps children learn more about Jesus through singing worship songs, arts and crafts and storytelling sessions.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Sanctuary Salvation & Our Savior
channel.desc: The first compartment of the sanctuary is the courtyard; the courtyard is where people are covered and cleansed by the blood of Jesus; people are justified by faith through the blood of the Lamb in the courtyard.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: IIW Sabbath School
channel.desc: The host, along with a panel of religious scholars, conduct various discussions to provide an in-depth insight into various topics from the Bible and the life of Jesus Christ.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Spotless
channel.desc: Shelley Quinn discusses Jesus' invitation to come to Him and find rest and the joy of finding repentance in one's life.
